decision_conditions: in accordance with the following plans: FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00111revPL02 received 8 March 2019, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00101revPL02 received 8 March 2019, Proposed Site Plan FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00- DR-A-00121revPL10 received 10 July 2020, Proposed L0 Floor Plan FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00131revPL06 received 1 June 2020, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00162revPL06 received 1 June 2020, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A00165revPL03 received 9 July 2020, FS0833- EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00166revPR01 received 17 June 2019, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00171revPL03 received 17 June 2019, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00- DR-A-00181revPL02 received 8 March 2019, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-01-DR-A00133revPL04 received 1 June 2020, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-DR-A-00161revPL06 received 1 June 2020, FS0833-EFAA-SLD-ZZ-XX-DR-L-4025 Rev J received 22 June 2019, FS0833-EFAA-RTA-ZZ-00-DR-A-00132revPL03 received 8 March 2019 and Landscape Finishes Plan S0833-EFAA-SLD-ZZ-XX-DR-L-4010 Rev B received 22 June 2020; description: Non-material amendment to approved permission 0985/19: Alter the wording of Condition no. 2 (refer to cover letter). Raise the brick plinth by 225mm on NE, SE & SW elevations and extension of brick plinth along the base of the full length of the NE elevation. Reduction in roof plant, relocation of roof plant, relocation of rooflight/roof access and alteration to the plant screen. MUGA boundary fence moved in 450mm and planting details along SE elevation amended. Change of 4 no. window type/size to group / hygiene rooms on SW Elevation. Change of 7 no. windows - type / size / position on NE Elevation and 1 no. window on SE elevation. Entrance lobby - small increase in size and introduction of brick plinth at base of curtain walling (SE elevation). Addition of 1 no. rainwater pipe and relocation of 1 no. rainwater pipe on NE elevation. Reduction of the height of the glass balustrade on the playdeck from 2200mm to 1700mm. Addition of a covered secure bike store where hoops were already proposed and increase from 8 to 10 no. cycle spaces. Alteration to the bell mouth entrance design Aldborough Road North. (Summrary).
site_name: Development Site At William Torbitt Primary School
